title: PM orders urgent action to end KP flour crisis
content:
LONDON, May 08 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Monday ordered an inquiry into the flour crisis in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa and directed urgent steps to end the crisis.
The prime minister from London contacted his advisor and President Pakistan Muslim League-N KP Engineer Amir Muqam and spoke to him on the issued relating to unavailability of flour in the province.
He said Khyber Pakhtunkhwa was an important part of the country like other provinces and stressed resolving the problems of the people on priority.
